name: A Rogue's Journey (MappiPlays)
description:
A Rogue's Journey

You are on a Journey on a unknown Planet. Defend yourself with your lasergun and fight these strange creatures!

Controls: 

  • Movement: WASD
  • Shooting: Arrow-Keys
  • Pause: ESC

This game is my submission to the 7DRL Challange 2023 Game Jam
